column4: Okay, installed Ubuntu desktop into virtual box. It's set to NAT. Still cannot ssh into t.
I'm about to give up on linux, haha. This just isn't working for me D;
wait, you only JUST install Ubuntu in a virtualbox and it didn't work as expected immediately and you are going to give up on it. Is that right?
lol, I've been working on this for a week now. openssh-server and client are installed. changing nat/brige, vmware/virtualbox does nothing
did you ask in #vbox at all?
